mapper.insert: insert into board_book (BNO, WRITETYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, NICKNAME) VALUES (board_book_seq.nextval, #{writeType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: update board_book set attachFileCnt = (select count(bno) from attach_file where bno=#{bno}) where bno = #{bno}
update board_book set WRITETYPE = #{writeType}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
